statements: SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT doctor_name FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialization LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY doctor_id ASC;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr.%' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC, doctor_id DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Neurology' ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY doctor_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr.%' OR specialization = 'Orthopedics' ORDER BY specialization, doctor_name;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialization IN ('Cardiology', 'Dermatology') AND doctor_name NOT LIKE '%Dr%' ORDER BY specialization;
SELECT * FROM Doctors;
SELECT name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Surgery' AND name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 40 ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Doctors D INNER JOIN Patients P ON D.specialty = P.name WHERE D.specialty = 'Pediatrics';
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, COUNT(appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM doctors INNER JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name, specialty;

SELECT patients.patient_name, doctors.doctor_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE doctors.specialty = 'Oncology' ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, doctor_id, patient_id FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, patient_name FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, available_date, start_time, end_time FROM doctors JOIN schedules ON doctors.doctor_id = schedules.doctor_id
SELECT * FROM Doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id, patient_id, appointment_datetime FROM Appointments WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='F' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM Departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%logy%';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_datetime, diagnosis FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_datetime >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_datetime DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM Doctors JOIN Schedule ON Doctors.doctor_id = Schedule.doctor_id ORDER BY day_of_week, start_time;
